00038         Q_OBJECT
00039 public:
00040         KviScriptUserButton(QWidget * par,const char * name);

00043         KviKvsScript * m_pScript;

00053 class KVIRC_API KviWindowScriptButton : public KviScriptUserButton
00054 {
00055         Q_OBJECT
00056 public:

00061 public:
